listing.listing_description: A slice of paradise, beachside Cielo 3 is the epitome of style and luxury. Ideal for an intimate wedding or special celebration, the six-bedroom tropical retreat benefits from a daily maid service and the provision of a wonderful Thai chef. An enchanting beach borders the villa’s landscaped garden, with soft white sands and turquoise waters.The villa’s elongated saltwater pool provides an elegant focus to the tranquil sun deck. Swim with the sunrise for an invigorating start to your day, or enjoy a romantic moonlit dip before retiring to the beachside ‘sala’ with a cool drink. Hi-tech Cielo allows you to connect your iPod to the villa entertainment system. Create the perfect evening ambiance for a poolside meal or private party with Cielo’s mood lighting technology. Ideal for chilled out evenings, the family media room offers a staggering two thousand movies and on-screen Internet access for games and web surfing. If you love an active vacation, you will be thrilled to learn of Cielo’s collection of sea kayaks and five-a-side soccer pitch.With cinematic views out to the runway pool, an open, contemporary living room is the striking centerpiece of Cielo’s interior. Enjoy laid-back evenings, reclining on the generous couches as you look out to sea or encourage your fellow guests as they take on a friendly game of pool. In common with the majority of the villa, the dining room enjoys the feeling of freedom gifted by the surrounding sliding-glass doors. A combination of pure white and crystal clear tableware is the modest counterpart to the exotic, delectable cuisine, served by your in-house chef.Two ocean-view master suites reflect the calming coastal surroundings, with understated color schemes and tasteful, simple design. Sliding glass doors present heavenly views of the vibrant blues of the ocean and the villa’s emerald green lawn, dotted with palms. The guest bedrooms are equally as comfortable and elegant. Of the en-suite bathrooms, one is shared, and four private. Spa quality, all bathrooms feature refreshing rain-showers, while some enjoy luxuriant built-in bathtubs.Phuket’s iconic Phang Nga Bay is nearby, with its towering limestone islands. Take a boat tour to witness the spectacular scenery close up and visit traditional fishing village Koh Panyee. Brimming with character, this extraordinary village is built over the water on stilts, and is fortified at the back by a terrific rock monolith.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This exceptional four-bedroom villa is situated on the north shore of Koh Samui within the Miskawaan Estate, a private hamlet of eleven homes along Maenam and Bangrak beaches. Villa Bougainvillea is distinguished by the extraordinary beauty of its design and décor, with fine original artwork and intricate detail infusing its ample living spaces with a uniquely inspiring ambiance. Special amenities include a long swimming pool and a classic sala pavilion with alfresco dining table and sumptuous massage bed. The villa's private staff will elevate your experience of this Southeast Asian paradise, providing comfort, security, and fabulous gourmet meals.The villa evokes the air of a tropical oasis, its gem-toned pool like a secluded lagoon amid lush gardens and palms. Bask in the sun on elegant lounge chairs or relax on the charming bench-swing with panoramic views of the Gulf of Thailand. A lovely gate opens to the white-sand beach, where you can embark across the water on a kayak or plunge into the luminous waves. The open-walled sala is perfect for cool afternoon comforts, its four-poster massage bed and exquisite wood dining table perched upon a soothing tile floor.The cavernous great room features a spacious television lounge and large dining table with seating for ten beneath vaulted timber ceilings. Abundant natural daylight and superb pendant lanterns illuminate the artwork adorning the villa's walls, while ample doors open to the sala, pool, and sea-kissed breeze. The adjacent kitchen features chef-grade appliances, rich wood cabinetry, and a beautiful brick bar.Arrayed around the pool, the bedrooms open broadly to the gardens and breeze. Fresh white bedding and wall finishes accentuate the rich teak furnishings. Each bedroom is air-conditioned and enjoys a walk-in closet, ceiling fan, and ensuite bathroom with indoor and outdoor showers.Miskawaan (meaning "Buddha's gardens") offers a superb alternative to the popular resorts on Koh Samui, ideal for weddings, special occasions, or as a home base while exploring this majestic island. Myriad family-friendly activities can be arranged, including watersports, Muay Thai lessons, yoga, cooking classes, yachting, "Frisbee golf," zip-lining over majestic waterfalls, or visiting the island's famous temples. Golf aficionados will enjoy Royal Samui, and nearby dining spots include the beachfront Black Rose Bar.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Enjoy hotel-worthy amenities in a private setting at Rom Trai at Samsara. Part of the exclusive Samsara Estate, the villa is staffed by a live-in chef and housekeeper, as well as concierge and security teams. The four-bedroom property’s airy contemporary interiors are rivaled by beautiful outdoor living areas with views across Nakalay Bay.Your stay at Rom Trai starts with a round-trip airport transfer and includes chef and housekeeping service. The waterfront villa has an infinity pool for lounging and a lap pool for exercise, a jetted tub and a large terrace with sitting and dining areas and a barbecue. Set the mood with indoor and outdoor sound systems, relax in the sauna and steam room, mix cocktails at the bar and entertain a crowd with a television, DVD player, library and Wi-Fi. For convenience, the villa has an elevator and baby equipment is available on request.The villa’s peaked roof and glass walls make for airy living spaces, and clean-lined furnishings add contemporary flair. A pair of tuxedo sofas and a Persian rug create a surprisingly cozy sitting area in the open living room, while woven chairs at the dining table and breakfast bar are a light touch of tropical style. A tucked-away library and television room are more intimate spaces for relaxing, and the fully equipped kitchen is likewise hidden behind the dining room.Each of the four bedrooms at Rom Trai has a king bed and looks out over the ocean, providing a constant reminder that you’re by the beach. Two of the bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms access to a private terrace; one of the terraces has its own jetted tub. The other two bedrooms share both a bathroom and a terrace with a jetted tub.Plan on a 40-minute drive from Phuket International Airport to the villa. Once you’ve arrived at Samsara Estate, it’s a 5-minute drive to the clinic and town at Kamala, an 8-minute drive to dining and tennis at the Novotel Resort and a 10-minute drive to the Patong gym and grocery store. The golf course at the Phuket Country Club is 14 km away by car, the Bangkok Phuket Hospital, 16 km away. With several beaches neighboring the estate within a 10- to 20-minute walk, you’ll have plenty of shore to explore.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Rom Trai is one of a select handful of private residences located within the Samsara Estate. Few, if any, private enclaves in the world match the unsurpassed luxury and privacy of Samsara. Straddling a secluded peninsula, it is a stunning juxtaposition of rocky shoreline, tropical gardens, and calming blue waters. Perched dramatically between 40 to 60 meters above sea level, these oceanfront villas offer spectacular panoramic views to the west and north over the Andaman Sea and Nakalay beach and to the south across Patong Bay.

listing.listing_description: Well known for its world-class beachfront environment, Phuket is quickly becoming one of the world’s most prestigious vacation destinations. From Signature Villa’s ocean-view terrace, you’ll have privacy provided by lush tropical greenery. Your entertainment will be the sun setting over the Andaman Sea. And, if you decide to venture beyond Trisara’s beautiful estate walls, you’ll find everything from small fishing villages and nature preserves to bustling cities and adventure tourism opportunities. With two king en-suite bedrooms, both with amazing ocean views, this villa is perfect for a small family, couples retreat, or sun-kissed honeymoon vacation.Decorated in ultra-luxurious fashion, Trisara Signature Pool Villa - 2 Bedroom is a classic example of the tropical-chic oceanside homes, for which Phuket is known. Mixing warm wood tones with an all-white color scheme creates a relaxing balance between form and function. The furniture is all designer. The electronics are state of the art. In the kitchen, high-end appliances will inspire your inner chef.At dinner, there’s a beautiful dining room inside with seating for eight, or you could dine outside under the stars at the alfresco set on the terrace. After dinner, there are several lounge areas and living spaces outside, all with great views of the Andaman Sea. There’s also a swimming pool, barbecue, and sun beds on the terrace. Back inside, features like Wi-Fi, television, air conditioning, and a washer/dryer will provide the comforts of home.If there’s a golfer in your group, Laguna Phuket Golf Course is a must-play for those who love challenging fairways with ocean views. Recently named “Asia’s Best Golf Course” by the World Golf Awards, this course makes the most of Phuket’s gorgeous environment with its peaks, valleys, and coastal features. If the city is more your style, head across the Island to Phuket Town and enjoy their bustling markets, beach bars, and vibrant nightlife.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Lime Samui residences encompass 12.5 acres of hillside splendor, harnessing the topography of the indigenous coconut palm and affording complete privacy. Villa Splash at Lime Samui embraces its natural settings, blending outdoor and indoor living with modern, minimalist aesthetics.The Villa is a fully staffed, luxury villa nestled on the hillside of Koh Samui’s pristine west coast, providing guests with unparalleled views of the Gulf of Thailand and overlooking the unspoiled islands of the Angthong National Marine Park.Easily accessible to Koh Samui’s many scenic beaches, restaurants and nightlife and within 40 minutes to the Koh Samui airport, Villa Splash at Lime Samui is an ideal destination for couples and families with children seeking the beauty and serenity of Thailand while residing at private oasis that is a home away from home. Upon arrival at Koh Samui airport, you will be greeted with the hospitality for which the Thais are renowned. Your personal driver will whisk you to Villa Splash at Lime Samui in a luxury SUV which may be available also for your use throughout your stay at the prevailing rate.

listing.listing_description: Designed to embrace Phuket’s gorgeous environment, this ocean-facing luxury villa captures outstanding views of the Andaman Sea, while its wide terrace doors invite fresh ocean breeze and natural sunlight. With three well-adorned king en-suite bedrooms, Trisara Signature Pool Villa - 3 Bedroom is perfect for a family vacation, couples retreat, or a golf trip with friends. Nearby, you’ll find some of Phuket’s most coveted beachfront areas, golf courses, and national parks.Phuket’s beach villa architecture is well known for its open-air approach to design. Mixing traditional influence with modern luxuries and open concept layouts creates a serene atmosphere, perfect for relaxing in seclusion, or hosting friends for an unforgettable evening. The villa makes great use of its vaulted ceilings and wide openings to punctuate the spacious feeling in the living room. Designer furniture, high-end electronics, and authentic Thai works of art decorate the sleek and stylish interior, adding a touch of elegance and excitement to the soothing beach environment.Enjoying ocean views from Trisara Signature Pool Villa - 3 Bedroom’s terrace is easy from its many vantage points. The infinity pool, living and dining areas, and sun loungers are all positioned for scenic views of the Andaman Sea. Inside, Wi-Fi, television, and a media room will help keep guests connected. And, Trisara Signature Pool Villa - 3 Bedroom comes with shared access to Trisara’s private beachfront, tennis courts, fitness facilities, swimming pools, and bars.Recently named “Asia’s Best Golf Course” by the World Golf Awards, Laguna Phuket Golf Course has been racking up such praise for many years. If there’s a golf aficionado in your group, this is a must-play. Soaring ocean views, lush tropical greenery, and challenging fairways make Laguna an instant favorite for golfers of any skill level. After a morning on the golf course, cool off at one of the many surrounding beachfront areas, several are within ten kilometers.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: A harmonious balance of inside and outside living, beachfront Villa Tievoli has been designed with absolute luxury in mind. A spacious living area is equally suited to both entertaining and ultimate relaxation, while the gardens merge seamlessly with the golden shoreline. Take the day trip of a lifetime to the idyllic island of Phuket. Step out of the villa’s double glass doors, promenade over the sweet, slatted bridge and slip gently into the sparkling infinity pool. From here it’s hard to tell where the pool ends and the magnificent Andaman Sea begins. Enjoy the novelty of the shaded lounger pods, ultra-padded for optimum comfort. Or opt for one of the classic loungers, elegantly lining the poolside. Take a refreshing drink across the garden to the open-air beach hut. Night or day, this is a romantic spot. Listen to the waves lapping at the shore, watch colorful sunsets, and lose yourself in the moment. For a relaxing evening, get cozy among the plentiful cushions of the family room, where you’ll find a satellite television. Or challenge your friends and family to a game of pool.Cool off under the fan in the glass fronted lounge – flooded with light and home to a generous silver-tone couch. The second lounge will be your evening host, with its up-lit bar, party-friendly couch and platinum color drinks tables. Gather here before moving through to the superb dining area for your evening meal, presented by Tievoli’s wonderful chef. The banqueting table is accessorized by quirky sand colored chairs, playfully mimicking the golden beach to the front of the villa.Thailand is a place for discovery, excitement and new experiences, but you’ll also want to return home refreshed and recharged. That’s where the villa’s five double bedrooms and a twin come in. All delivering a tranquil, comfortable retreat, expect to wake feeling utterly rested, and ready for a new day. Two of the bedrooms share a bathroom, while the other four each benefit from their own en-suite. Each room also has a flat screen television, perfect for winding down at the end of the night.Traditional Siamese ‘junk’ boats will take you on a magical tour of Phang Nga Bay.Ride under the red, wing-like sails, feel the sea-breeze in your hair and take in the spectacular, out-of-this-world scenery. Or venture out in a sea kayak to explore the ‘hongs’ of Phang Nga, small natural rooms that lie in some of the bay’s iconic limestone islands. Phuket airport is a 25 km from the villa.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Acting more like a boutique hotel, Villa Thousand Hills is luxuriously outfitted with three saltwater swimming pools, private beach access, and nine en-suite bedrooms, all with ocean views. While in Rawai, you and your guests will enjoy resort-like amenities and hospitality with the seclusion of a private rental. Thousand Hills is an architecturally astounding estate situated amongst lush tropical greenery, white sandy beach, and the beautiful Andaman Sea. Along the coast, you’ll find the bustling city of Patong, about thirty minutes away.Etched into the hillside, this nine-bedroom oasis is divided between one large Main House, and two guest houses, all linked together by an incredible ocean-view terrace with a covered center. Nearly every inch of Thousand Hills opens to the ocean view, inviting fresh ocean breeze and natural sunlight to flow freely within its open concept interior. There are two living rooms, both outfitted with plush designer furniture and high-end electronics. The kitchen is decked out with state o the art appliances. And, the formal dining area features a beautiful wood table with seating for fourteen. Other indoor spaces include a sauna, media room, exercise room, wine cellar, and a billiards lounge.On the terrace, you’ll love the multiple lounge/dining areas, a hot tub, and three pools. When it’s time to hit the beach, walk down to Ao Sen, it will take less than one minute. Thousand Hills comes with the use of snorkeling gear, kayaks, paddle boards, and three bicycles.There’s always plenty to see and do on the island of Phuket, and since it’s only about an hour’s drive from the northern to the southern tip, you’ll be able to explore as much as you want. For shopping, nightlife, beach bars, and cabarets, Patong’s Bangla Road cannot be beaten. If you’d like to learn a little about Thai culture, Big Buddha Phuket and What Chalong temples are great afternoon excursions. And, if you’re traveling with children, Splash Jungle Water Park is an incredible theme park, offering a wave pool, waterslides, restaurants, and a swim-up bar for the big kids.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Take your Koh Samui holiday to the next level at Villa Zest in Lime Samui Estate. From its location just above the port town of Nathon, this hillside vacation rental commands spectacular views of the sea that even take in Angthong Marine Park and the Five Islands. A full staff elevates the experience to one of true tropical luxury for up to ten friends or family members.Your stay begins with an airport transfer and includes the services of a driver, chef, villa manager and housekeeper. Start each day with the included breakfast, then venture out on the provided sea kayaks or mountain bikes—or simply relax in the outdoor lounging and dining areas by the infinity pool. Kids will want to try out the outdoor zipline and trampoline, while grown-ups will appreciate the indoor fitness area, wine fridge and Wi-Fi access.Fold back the villa’s glass walls to let the warm breezes flow through the open-plan great room at its heart. A sunken sofa is the perfect place to watch television or enjoy the views, and there’s room for ten in chic Lucite chairs around the dining table. Though chef service is included in your stay, there’s also a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar.Villa Zest at Lime Samui has five bedrooms with king beds, including the master suite, and one bedroom with two queen plus two single beds. All five bedrooms have private en-suite bathrooms and ceiling fans, and several have honeymoon-suite-worthy features such as lounge areas, terrace access and jetted tubs.Though its hillside setting feels quiet and restful, the villa is just a short drive from the bustling shops, restaurants and port of Nathon and the town’s beach, as well as the more laid-back Maenam Beach, and the tennis courts and golf course of Santiburi Resort. For a memorable half-day trip, head to Na Muang Safari Park or the impressive Big Buddha Temple.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Treat yourself to one of the largest infinity pools on Koh Samui—and an endless ocean panorama—at Samujana Twenty. The only oceanfront vacation rental on the Samujana estate, this luxury villa is just steps from the rocky shoreline and expanse of turquoise water. Invite up to ten friends and family for a warm-weather reunion, yoga retreat or even an intimate tropical wedding.Your holiday at Samujana includes daily breakfast, airport transfers and the services of a villa manager, who can help arrange dinner by a private chef, massages, excursions and more. Spend your stay relaxing on the lounge chairs by the infinity pool, stretching out or practicing yoga in the home gym, or playing rousing rounds of lawn game or ping-pong. For a perfect end to the day, enjoy dinner from the poolside barbecue and finish with a little stargazing from the rooftop terrace.Not only are the sunken living room, spacious dining room and fully equipped kitchen at Samujana Twenty open plan, they’re open to the ocean breezes, too. A built-in sectional and long Parsons dining table provide plenty of room for guests to gather, while wicker furniture and sandstone floors are chic, beachy touches. Snack or serve a buffet-style meal from the kitchen’s dramatically cantilevered breakfast bar.All five of the villa’s bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, lounge areas and private terraces overlooking the ocean, so there are no worries about who has the best views. There are three bedrooms with king beds, including the master suite, one with two twin beds, and one with a king bed and twin bed that’s perfect for parents traveling with children.Both a family-friendly destination and a dreamy spot that tops many honeymooners’ lists, Koh Samui is lush and lovely. Samujana makes it easy to explore the island, with a Plai Laem location that’s just 5 minutes from casual Choeng Mon Beach and trendy Chaweng Beach, and 7 minutes from shopping and dining. Tee off at one of two nearby golf courses, encounter local flora and fauna in the rainforest or ask Samujana staff to help arrange a yacht charter, diving expedition or zipline tour.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Glass-walled rooms encircle the flowering tree in the tranquil courtyard of this contemporary residence in Cherngtalay. Its curving rooflines evoke the classic architecture of Thailand, but oversized faces peer out from modern paintings in its gallery-like rooms. Watch the breeze ruffle the surface of the pond beyond the pool and drive 3 minutes to join honeymooners and families on Laguna Beach.A covered alfresco living area leads the way to a sunny terrace with alfresco dining for 8, plenty of loungers, and an infinity pool that seems to spill into the pond just beyond the villa. After a day at the beach, the spa, or on the golf course, pour a glass from the wine fridge and let the curved smart TV and Wi-Fi entertain.Fold-away glass walls are all that separates the great room from the outdoor living areas of this vacation rental. Two sitting areas stretch out beneath a vaulted wooden ceiling, and the adjacent dining area seats 8. If you’ve brought the whole family on holiday, let kids perch at the breakfast bar for a snack while you prep dinner in the sleek fully equipped kitchen. Each of the 4 bedrooms at this luxury property has a king bed, private ensuite bathroom, and access to the terrace or gardens. Like the main living areas, the bedrooms are also air conditioned.Guests of the villa are welcome at the Banyan Tree resort amenities. Take the resort shuttle to visit the pool, book a massage at the spa, or reserve a tee time at Laguna Phuket Golf Club. Beyond the resort, it’s less than a 5-minute drive to the white sands and calm waters of Laguna and Bang Tao beaches, lined with casual bars and restaurants, and you’re close to some of the best shopping and clubs in the Thalang area.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Blurring indoor and outdoor spaces in the most spectacular fashion, this private luxury villa is the perfect atmosphere for enjoying Thailand’s beautiful ocean environment. Located on the hillside of the Samujana Estate, Villa Seventeen boasts some of the areas most spectacular ocean views.Incorporating the natural rock face of the hillside into its living spaces, this sleek villa is not only comfortable and luxurious, it’s also an architectural triumph. Nature elements like wood, stone, and lush gardens are used throughout interior and exterior spaces, both as decoration and building materials. The open concept design, and merging of spaces, ensure an ease of flow for sunlight and fresh ocean breeze. Minimalistic designer furniture, a neutral colour scheme, and numerous windows and openings allow the vibrant hues of nature to capture guests attention.The kitchen comes equipped with state of the art appliances, a breakfast bar, and formal dining for eight. The lounge, study, and home theatre room are great places to relax after a day on the beach. An iPod docking station, surround sound system, barbecue, and alfresco dining area make Seventeen an ideal spot for hosting family and friends. And, the saltwater infinity pool is perfect for a refreshing morning dip, after an exciting night under the stars. Also included with the rental is daily housekeeping, airport transfer, and breakfast.King beds, ensuites with showers, bathtubs, and bidets, lounge areas, and private access to the terrace are all features of Seventeen’s four private bedrooms. Decorated in the same minimalistic style as the living room, the bedrooms and ensuites are sophisticated and elegant, while remaining cozy and inviting.Thailand is rich with beautiful dynamic landscapes. Beaches, rain forest, country clubs, and golf courses are all great ways to take in the areas natural features, and they are all within a few miles of the Estate. If you’d like a trip to town, shopping, restaurants, and nightlife are all readily available on Koh Samui’s Main Street.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Acting more like a boutique resort, this ultra-luxurious, compound-style six bedroom has a lengthy list of amenities, including two infinity pools, numerous games and water sports equipment, and beautiful beachfront. Villa Saanti comes with a housekeeper, service staff, and private chef to help make your stay as relaxing as possible. The villa is located on the beachfront of Natai in Phang Nga, less than an hour from the bustling city of Phuket.Inside, Villa Saanti is equipped with state of the art electronics, a sauna, an exercise room, spacious lounge areas, and a formal dining space with seating for twelve. The villa’s decor puts a modern-contemporary spin on traditional Thai design, creating a space that is both relaxing, yet formal enough for the most important of occasions. Each of Saanti’s six bedrooms features a king-sized bed, a lavishly equipped en-suite, and direct access to a private outdoor area.Outside, you’ll love dining alfresco, and preparing meals in the outdoor kitchen, complete with a wood-burning pizza oven. After dinner, challenge a friend to a game of table tennis, pool, or stroll down to the beach and go kayaking, surfing, or try your luck at fishing; everything you’ll need is supplied. If you’d prefer something more laid-back, mix up your favorite cocktail and enjoy the ocean view from the hot tub, beachside sala, or one of the spacious outdoor living areas.After you’ve spent a day or two enjoying your own slice of Natai Beach, venture down the coast to Phuket to immerse yourself in exciting Thai culture. On the way down, stop in Phuket’s Old Town area for an afternoon of shopping, museum tours, and delicious Thai cuisine. At night, Bangla Road is the island’s nightlife capital, with vibrant streets lined with dance clubs, bars, and other exciting attractions. And, if there’s a golfer in your group, visit Red Mountain Golf Club and enjoy a round on one of Asia’s top courses.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Under the azure sky of the Gulf of Thailand, this beachside villa offers radiant glamor alongside contemporary, inventive design. Rich interiors and sun-splashed terraces ensure that guests can relax indoors amidst regal decor, or soak up the Thai sunshine from the poolside recliners. After a walk on the beach, visit Koh Samui's famous Big Buddha, plus myriad close-by dining and shopping options.The towering wooden reaches and inventive interior of this villa’s soaring living room will slowly glow with the light of the new day; a perfect spot from which to plan your outings on this famous holiday island. After an energetic session in the private gym, plunge into the blue-tiled embrace of the exterior pool, before drying off with a book or device in the cushioned and luxuriously-shaded gazebo. Finely detailed stonework enriches the villa’s welcoming bathrooms, while the fresh breeze from the Gulf is best experienced from the intricate-decorated railings of the upper balconies.From Angthong Villa, guests have access to a dizzying range of outing options. Being located with direct access to the sandy expanse of Bophut Beach, guests can simply start walking, and quickly experience the sunlit glory of this storied stretch of Thai coast. Visit an abundance of extravagant, awe-inspiring Buddhist and Hindu temples, or experience the richness of Thai cuisine at the renowned restaurants and tucked-away eateries that pack this part of the island. Cruise outings, excursions to the forested interior, and even sea kayaking from the beach are all great options. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Meaning ‘villa of love and sunshine’ exquisite Rak Tawan provides an abundance of both. Striking oriental architecture lends a charming traditional nature to this hillside villa, while modern touches accentuate the luxurious setting. From the upper terrace, marvel at spectacular sunsets, the enchanting sky mirrored in the resting ocean. Relax, shop or dine in style at nearby Surin beach.The topaz infinity pool juts proudly over the abundant hillside below, extending towards the dazzling horizon. Float weightlessly above Surin bay, or soak up the tropical sun from the comfort of a poolside lounger. Stroll over to the cocktail bar for a fruity refreshment, and recline with your drink in the shade of the opulent outdoor lounge. Delightful twin massage pergolas reside on either end of the pool, where you can request divine spa treatments while overlooking the sparkling sea.A tremendously well-equipped gym offers a mix of strength and cardio machines. Inspirational views of clear blue skies and lush green foliage set a magnificent backdrop to your workout.An eclectic mix of artwork adorns the villa’s walls. From ancient portraits to political statement pieces and pop culture references, you will have fun unravelling the story behind each piece. Simple, comfortable furniture has been thoughtfully chosen to balance with the traditional basis of Rak Tawan’s design. Look forward to mindful mornings on Buddha’s balcony, accessed through a spiritual corridor, lined with vibrant bird of paradise flora. As the sun sinks towards the horizon, retire to the upper lounge – a restful room with broad vistas of Surin bay. A sleek modern kitchen hosts a welcoming breakfast bar and casual dining table. Here your private chef will prepare sensational gourmet meals, a real treat for the taste buds.Continuing the modern-traditional fusion of style, silky cushions and rich, polished wood are married with modern art and sumptuous king sized beds in the villa’s five bedrooms. Welcome each glorious day from the bedrooms’ wrap around balcony, which doubles as a magnificent view point. Luxurious en-suite bathrooms ensure a totally relaxing bathing experience. Roomy showers are forgiving when you fling your arms wide, mid-song. ‘His and hers’ sinks and inviting deep bathtubs complete the indulgent feel of these rooms.Sophisticated Surin beach is a pleasant five-minute stroll from the villa. Fine white sands and crystal clear waters create a heavenly spot to relax with a book, or take a refreshing dip. Surrounding the beach you will find exclusive wine bars and high-end restaurants serving up exciting, exotic flavours. Phuket airport is a short 15km drive.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Holiday dreams come true at Baan Mika. This exquisite Koh Samui vacation rental is set on the white sands of Plai Laem Beach, offering views to the hills across the sea along with five-star service and luxury amenities. It’s a stunning backdrop for a relaxed stay with family, a milestone celebration with friends or even a destination wedding in a tropical idyll.Your stay begins with an airport transfer to the villa, where you’ll be welcomed with fresh fruit and flowers. Daily continental breakfast is included, as are the services of a Thai chef, villa manager and housekeeper. Spend blissful days lounging by the swimming pool, trying local fare on the barbecue or snacking at the al-fresco dining table for twelve, followed by laid-back nights in front of the satellite TVs and surround-sound system.Baan Mika feels like your own private resort, laid out in pavilions around the swimming pool and facing the sea. You’ll want to spend most of your time in the shade of the open-sided living and dining areas, but there’s also a dining room and fully equipped kitchen that can be enclosed with glass walls if you’d like.The villa’s six bedrooms are honeymoon-worthy retreats with en-suite bathrooms, lounge areas and access to the pool terrace. There are two bedrooms with king beds and four bedrooms with two twin beds each; several also have al-fresco showers.A stay at Baan Mika puts the white sands of Plai Laem right at your doorstep—just descend the stairs to put your feet in the shallows. It’s also a short drive from three other popular beaches, including Chaweng Beach, as well as local attractions like the Big Buddha and the shops and eateries of Fisherman’s Village in Bophut. Golfers will appreciate the two golf courses within easy reach.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Utilizing its breathtaking coastal perch, Villa Solaris captures dynamic ocean views from its birds-eye positioning within the prestigious Amarin Estate on the hillside of Kamala, Phuket. With four king en-suite bedrooms, this pavilion-style vacation home embraces the beautiful natural surroundings of Phuket, incorporating lush greenery, mature palms, and ocean views into its decor at every opportunity. From its convenient location, guests of Solaris will have access to Phuket’s best beachfront, golf, shopping, dining, and nightlife, all within a few minutes drive.Floor-to-ceiling windows and openings seamlessly merge indoor and outdoor spaces to create a soothing, open-air atmosphere throughout Solaris’ elegant interior. Designed with traditional Thai architecture in mind, Solaris adds in a touch of modern luxury with high-end electronics, designer furniture, and the most lavish fixtures and finishings. Throughout the interior, you’ll appreciate an eclectic collection of local art, as well as contemporary pieces that are sure to spark conversation. And, whether you’re planning a group gather or looking to break away for more intimate moments, Solaris has plenty of spacious and secluded seating areas for both.Villa Solaris comes with a full staff, consisting of a housekeeper, private cook, security guard, villa manager, and airport-transfer, to help make your stay even more relaxing. Features like Wi-Fi and the home theatre will help keep you connected, should you desire. Outside, the three infinity swimming pools, sun loungers, and amazing ocean views will provide the rest, relaxation, and rejuvenation that only a beach vacation can offer.When it’s time to head to the beach, you’ll have three beautiful options, Kamala, Patong, and Surin, all of which are within ten kilometers of Solaris. If there’s a golfer in the group, Red Mountain and Laguna are two of Thailand’s best courses, both offering incredible views as you meander through their winding tropical fairways. After, reward yourself with a night on the town. Start in Old Phuket with some boutique shopping and traditional Thai cuisine.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Nestled in the tropical jungle of Koh Samui’s luxurious hillside community, Villa Milla offers unprecedented privacy and an open-air atmosphere like no other. With four en-suite bedrooms, all with access to the terrace, Milla is perfect for a secluded family vacation, golf trip, or retreat. Nearby, you’ll find several beautiful public beaches, golf courses, historical sites, and quaint fishing villages. For a quick intro to Thai culture, visit Big Buddha Temple, just two-kilometers from Milla. There, you’ll find gorgeous views, a beautifully manicured landscape, and the iconic Big Buddha monument, which can be seen as for away as Phuket Town.Luxuriously adorned with floor-to-ceiling glass, natural stone, and locally sourced wood, Villa Milla’s construction celebrates Thailand’s lush environment, inviting it to flow throughout its interior. Wide doorways and an open-concept floor plan enhance the open-air ambiance, allowing guests and the fresh breeze to move from inside to out, with no barriers. In the living room, plush designer seating, contemporary furniture, and ocean-inspired art decorate the large common area, which encompasses the fully-equipped kitchen, and eight seat dining area.Hosting is a breeze at Villa Milla, as it is well outfitted with an espresso machine, dishwasher, wine cellar, bar, sound system, and generous lounge areas inside. On the terrace, there’s even more sitting, dining, and lounge space surrounding the infinity pool, all with scenic views of Choeng Mon’s tropical hillside.The nearest beach to Villa Milla is Choeng Mon, just one-kilometer to the East. Although a favorite among locals and returning visitors, Choeng Mon Beach always feels like a secluded spot you’ve just discovered. With shops and amenities just a short walk up the hill, several beachfront bars and restaurants, you’ll be free to spend as much time on the beach as you desire. If you’ve got a golfer in your midst, Royal Samui and Santiburi golf clubs are both about fifteen kilometers from Milla.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Beach lovers will adore this chic tropical retreat, intelligently arranged over three levels. A sensational location within a secure gated estate and a team of private staff make Essenza 4 the perfect venue for large family vacations, group events or romantic weddings. You’ll barely have time to slip into your flip flops before arriving on the soft warm sands of peaceful Sava Estate beach.Lavender sunsets and spellbinding views from every room are just some of the attractions of this gorgeous beachfront villa. Outdoors, the glass-smooth infinity pool dissolves into the ocean at the end of a manicured lawn. While you stretch out poolside on a padded sun lounger and indulge in a good book or just catch up on your thoughts, ask your Thai chef to create a culinary feast for you and your fellow guests. Continental breakfasts and shaded lunches can be enjoyed under the canopy of the outdoor dining pavilion, or perhaps you’d prefer a barbecue under the stars?Indoors, the expansive central lounge area draws in cooling sea breezes front and back, and a spacious family room sits to the left of the entrance. Soak up the views from the formal dining table or settle deep in the cushions of one of the plush sofas and let your eyes rest on the horizon…or the television screen. A cutting edge lighting and entertainment system allows you to set the mood in each room and built-in speakers mean you can take your tunes anywhere.The six air-conditioned bedrooms are a welcome retreat at the end of the day. Huge sliding glass doors have been artfully designed to bring the outside in, so you can drift off to sleep and awake refreshed, accompanied by the swish of the waves lapping on the shore. Four of the bedrooms are en-suite, while two share a deluxe bathroom. If you dream of looking out to sea while you bathe in a deep tub, you’ve found your ideal vacation home.It’s hard to imagine, but if you tire of the beautiful beach in your backyard, there are plenty of other activities to keep you occupied. Massages and spa treatments can be arranged in your villa and excursions can be planned, all for an extra cost. Alternatively, jump in your rental vehicle, safely parked in the garage, and head to the lively towns of Phuket, Khaolak and Takuapa, all within an hour’s drive. Phuket International Airport is just 27 km away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: With a waterfront setting, personalized service and contemporary architecture, Saengootsa at Samsara is the perfect villa for travelers who don’t want to compromise. During your stay, you’ll enjoy chef and housekeeping service, inviting outdoor living areas and beaches a short walk away. Designed by the architect of the Samsara Estate as a private getaway, the five-bedroom villa is a beautiful, light-filled setting for your tropical escape.Your stay at Saengootsa includes airport transfers and chef, housekeeping, concierge and security service. The villa is designed to let you enjoy the beautiful waterfront setting, with an infinity pool surrounded by chaise longues and a shady sala, a covered outdoor dining area and outdoor kitchen with barbecue. Private terraces and jetted tubs are the perfect places for sunset cocktails or watching the stars. In the evenings, set the mood with the indoor and outdoor sound systems, relax in the media room, gather at the bar and pool table in the games room or catch up in the office or via Wi-Fi.The villa uses polished concrete, pale wood paneling and plenty of glass to industrial-chic effect. Tucked under a lofty peaked roof and surrounded by sliding doors, the open-concept living areas take on a bright, casually luxurious feel. Low-slung sectionals and benches have minimalist appeal, while suede upholstery and warm neutral tones soften the contemporary lines. There’s room for everyone on the living room’s cube-like sofas, and the dining room’s counter-like table can seat the whole group. Cooks will appreciate both the TV and the sea views from the fully equipped open kitchen.Thanks to the waterfront location of Saengootsa, each of its five bedrooms has a sea view. The master bedroom has a king bed, en-suite bathroom and access to a private terrace with a jetted tub, and a second bedroom has a king bed, en-suite bathroom and access to a private terrace with tub. A third bedroom has a queen bed, two twin Murphy beds and an en-suite bathrooms. The fourth and fifth bedrooms each have two twin beds and share a terrace with a tub; one has an en-suite bathroom and the other has access to a hallway bathroom.Since Saengootsa is on a stretch of rocky shoreline, guests in search of sand can make the 10- to 20-minute walk to neighboring beaches. From the villa, it’s a 5-minute drive to the clinic and town at Kamala, an 8-minute drive to restaurants and a tennis court at the Novotel Resort and a 10-minute drive to the Patong gym and grocery store. You’ll find the golf course at the Phuket Country Club a 14 km drive away, Bangkok Phuket Hospital a 30-minute drive away, and a church and Phuket International Airport a 27 km drive away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Perched dramatically between 40 to 60 meters above sea level, these oceanfront villas offer spectacular panoramic views to the west and north over the Andaman Sea and Nakalay beach and to the south across Patong Bay.

listing.listing_description: Located on the southern tip of Koh Samui, the most tranquil part of the island, you’ll be welcomed with the sounds of nature and the rippling sea. The peaceful, open-concept property features private access to Laem Sor Beach just steps from the backyard. Each room, designed with a minimal aesthetic, offers full ocean views. Grab a pair of kayaks and paddle along the shimmering turquoise shoreline.The pavilion is furnished with modern décor, including plump sofas, artful accents, and handcrafted wooden furniture. Expansive sliding glass doors open from the living space onto the patio, allowing one to flow into the other. Swaying palm trees, frangipani, and exotic shrubbery are planted throughout the manicured garden. A refreshing infinity pool, tiled to imitate the hue of the surf beyond, invites you to dive in on scorching afternoons. The covered terrace is a serene spot to sit, relax, and sip a morning coffee while watching the vibrant sunrise. Nestled amongst unspoiled nature, you’ll feel like you’re miles away from tourist attractions yet are just a short drive from the Town of Nathon; get your souvenir shopping done, try a taste of authentic Thai street fare at the Night Food Market, and peruse the picturesque seafront plaza. Buddhist temple Wat Plai Laem is a must-see day trip destination, as well as Chaweng Beach and Na Muang Safari Park. Channel your inner cowboy and try a guided horseback riding trek along the coast.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Villa 2 is one of three stunning villas that make up the impressive Sangsuri Estate on Koh Samui. This capacious villa is designed as a series of enchanting, stand-alone living pavilions spread through beautifully landscaped grounds, overlooking a quiet stretch of beach north of Chaweng. Guests will be truly immersed in the richness of the tropical setting while cushioned in sophisticated modern luxury.The poolside lounge is the perfect space to get immersed in a book, with your favorite tunes piped through the villa’s built-in speakers, or to recline on a daybed in front of a movie on the cinema screen. More active souls will love the villa’s two inviting ocean view swimming pools, while a huge beachside Jacuzzi makes regular dips irresistible. Mealtimes are also a memorable private pleasure, with a choice of alfresco dining spaces in which to enjoy succulent dishes prepared by the villa’s private chef.The villa strikes a perfect balance between modern, ultra-stylish architectural designs and natural elegance, drawing on the striking beauty of the location. The lounge area is furnished with a cushioned sofa and day bed, and the kitchen features a central island breakfast bar protected from the elements. The dining pavilion seats up to ten guests and is surrounded on three sides by wooden shutters that rotate to draw in the soothing ocean views.The master suite opens onto a private terrace to the rear, featuring a huge outdoor bathtub and a secluded sun terrace with sun beds overlooking the beach. From the upper level bedrooms, steps made of Balinese stone descend around an old tree to expansive planted areas, backed by an attractive, planted wall. With eight bedrooms, Villa 2 at Sangsuri Estate can accommodate up to sixteen guests.The unique layout and designs at Sangsuri Estate’s Villa 2 effortlessly bring together nature and contemporary luxury, allowing guests to spend the majority of their time outdoors enjoying the stunning vistas and soothing tropical surroundings. Spend your day swimming and sunbathing, then return for evening cocktails, followed by a barbeque, or relaxing in the lounge with a movie on the projector screen. Take a stroll down the beach and be rewarded with a close up view of the nearby, uninhabited island of Koh Matlang. Let Sangsuri Estate become your oasis!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Taste the peace of the peaceful southern coast of Koh Samui at this plush cliffside villa. From this home’s raised location, guests can take in a fabulous view of the blue Tean Island straits in the distance. Airy interiors and premium luxury typify this home, with forest-view balconies and an infinity pool promising next-level comfort, while secluded beaches and charming towns all lie close by.Guests are close enough to the tropical coastline to be able to take in the sail boats and white waves that puncture the stunning blue sea, with the viewpoint balcony a great spot to sip coffee in the fresh mornings while sinking into rich cushions. Freely wander the green lawns and take up a poolside recliner, with the vine-wrapped cliff behind and the lush forest stretching in front. The distinct white color scheme of this villa emphasizes the impressive ceilings and spacious, well-furnished interior, with the soaring, traditional Thai ceilings helping to keep the space as cool as possible .In contrast to northern Koh Samui, this villa is located on the quieter southern coast. From the villa, guests have good access to sandy and sunny local beaches, or can make a short drive to premiere seaside spas and resorts such as Nikki Beach. The uniquely rich cultural heritage of this Thai island is represented via local sites like the ornate coastal tower of Laem Sor Pagoda. The wild beauty of the island can be intimately experienced at the picturesque Namuang waterfall just to the north. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: From bed to the beach in seconds, this traditional Thai villa in Lipa Noi loves showing off its pristine environment. Follow pathways through gardens and water features to the sand. Sit and read beneath the shade of a palm tree. Then, join the group inside for dinner, prepared by a private chef. If you’d prefer to dine out, head to Nathon for dinner at a beachfront restaurant or bar.Walk the dark wood planked pool deck to find the perfect spot to work on your tan. Calm yourself with an afternoon yoga session on the sandy beachfront. Or, drift in and out of sleep while you sway in the hammock. From the peaks of extra-high ceilings to the stone-tiled floors, the vibe at Baan Tao Talay is all about relaxation and the celebration of Thailand’s environment. On wilder nights, turn up the sound system and mix a few tropical cocktails to enjoy in the beachfront gazebo. Unwind and enjoy the sunset while the full-staff takes care of everything else.Start your trip with a visit to Fisherman’s Village, where you can stock up on fresh local foods at the outdoor market. If you save the trip for later in the day, you can stop for dinner at one of their fantastic seafood restaurants. After dinner, do a little bar hopping or dance the night away in Chaweng, the island’s nightlife capital. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Part of the exclusive community of Samujana luxury properties on the island of Koh Sumai in Thailand, the four-bedroom villa Samujana Twenty-Seven features heavenly views of the Gulf of Thailand, expansive outdoor and indoor spaces for relaxation and entertainment, and exquisite design details that invite you to relish the beauty around you and discovery the tranquility within you.Enjoy long days of delicious sun on the terrace, bathing in the infinite swimming pool and gazing out at the panoramic view of azure ocean and verdant islands. In the afternoon, withdraw into the villa's beautiful indoor/outdoor living area, where the elegant lounge is perfect of meditative relaxation, and the beautiful dining table awaits you for sumptuous feasts in the gentle breeze. The fully equipped kitchen, overlooking the lounge and dining table, is the ideal laboratory for the Thai chefs among you, and there's even a gas grill for barbeque. Exquisite and charming decorative touches enhance the feeling of voluptuous peace.In addition to the ample indoor/outdoor living area, the villa features an indoor lounge with cozy furnishings and TV, perfect for movie-watching at night. There's also a well-equipped fitness center, an office space, and a rooftop terrace.With four bedrooms that sleep eight, the villa is the perfect vacation rental for families, groups of friends, and destination wedding guests. The four serene bedrooms all feature private access to the outdoor terrace through large glass doors. Three of the bedrooms have king beds, one has two twin beds, and all have ensuite bathrooms with stand-alone shower and bathtub. The master bedroom includes its own lounge area. With ceiling fans, TVs, and perfectly cozy bedding, the villa's bedrooms invite you to delicious privacy and peace at any time of day or night.At Samujana, you're perfectly placed to enjoy nights in downtown Koh Samui and days exploring the island's precious natural treasures. Choeng Mon Beach and Chaweng Beach are both five minutes away, and Koh Samui Rainforest is only ten miles from your door. Golfers will enjoy Bohput Hills Golf Club and Santiburi Samui Country Club, both a short drive away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Step beyond Villa Waterlily’s back gate, and you’ll land on the soft, sandy shore of Thailand’s Maenam Beach. With instant beachfront access, this private five-bedroom is the perfect host for your next incredible beach getaway. Villa Waterlily is secluded, yet conveniently located beach oasis decorated with vibrant lawns, palm trees, and a pristine saltwater swimming pool. Nearby, you’ll find plenty of water sports activities, golf, dining options, and historic sites.Rich wood tones, wide openings to the terrace, and high-vaulted ceilings give Waterlily a spacious, earthy ambiance that is sure to melt any travel related stresses away in an instant. You’ll hear the sound of waves gently washing over the white sand, feel the warm sun and fresh ocean breeze flowing through the open concept interior, and appreciate the private atmosphere that Waterlily’s lush greenery provides. In the living room, high-end electronics and designer furniture provide the comforts of home, while in the kitchen, a Thai chef provides your daily meals. In the evening, enjoy incredible sunsets from the terrace. Or for a closer look, arrange a beachfront picnic, with cocktails to follow.If you’re feeling adventurous, your beachfront area comes with the use of kayaks, snorkeling, and other water sports equipment, great for exploring Samui’s beautiful coast. After a day on the beach, rinse off in the fresco shower, pick your favorite lounge chair under the sala, and unwind before dinner. After you’ve eaten, turn on the outdoor speakers and enjoy another incredible night by the ocean.During your stay, Miskawaan Resort’s managers can help arrange a wide variety of on, and off-site activities, like Thai cooking classes, Muay Thai instruction, diving and snorkeling trips, and private yacht charters. If you’re a golf aficionado, Santiburi Country Club is the island’s best course, as well as a regular stop on the PGA Tour. And, for a taste of the local cuisine, head to the Maenam Walking Market, just around the corner from Maenam Chinese Temple, for nightly festivities.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Host an idyllic family reunion, celebrate a milestone anniversary or gather for an incredible tropical destination wedding at the expansive Villa Kalyana. As well appointed as any luxury boutique hotel, this fully staffed twenty-six-bedroom estate is your own private resort on the south shore of Koh Samui, just steps from the white sands of Laem Sor Beach.Your holiday at Villa Kalyana includes the services of the property’s full staff as well as those of a private chef. The estate opens to extensive beachfront living areas with a pool, lounging and dining spaces, barbecue deck and hammocks under palm trees. In the evenings, gather in the games room, watch a favorite movie in the entertainment center or share photos of your stay via Wi-Fi.The villa’s open-sided pavilions make it easy to fully enjoy the balmy weather. High ceilings, ornately carved panels and traditional artwork nod to classic Thai style in the living and dining rooms, while plenty of seating options ensure your comfort. In addition to the fully equipped kitchen for guests’ use, there is also a kitchen exclusively for staff use.This vacation rental is divided into an Orchid Wing with eight king bedrooms and two bedrooms with twin bunk beds, a Lotus Wing with nine king bedrooms and one bedroom with four bunk beds, and a Garden Wing with five king bedrooms and one bedroom with two twin bunk beds. All bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, and several are honeymoon-worthy bungalows with their own kitchenettes and living areas.Take advantage of the villa’s beachfront location and spend lazy days on the sand or in the water, playing with the provided volleyball and badminton sets or taking the snorkeling equipment out. If you’d like to see more of the area, check out nearby Lamai and Nikki beaches or take a day trip to Na Muang Safari Park.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Discover some of the best ocean views on Koh Samui at Samujana Eleven B. Set on a hillside overlooking the bay and designed to take full advantage of the vantage point, this modern vacation rental also seamlessly blends indoor and outdoor living spaces for views from nearly every room. Let the Samujana staff shuttle you to nearby beaches and attractions or arrange excursions for groups of friends and family, from children’s classes to yacht charters.Watch the sun move across the lush hillsides and boats ply the bay from the shaded sitting area on the villa’s private terrace or the sunny lounge area by the infinity pool. Try your own hand at cooking local produce on the barbecue in the outdoor kitchen, or ask one of the Samujana chefs to prepare something for you to enjoy at the open-air dining area. Pair the meal with a selection from the wine fridge, and set the mood with the sound system. Your holiday includes breakfast and an airport transfer, and services such as spa treatments or a driver can be arranged through the estate.The Samujana villas were designed by Gary Fell of GFAB Architects to be extensions of the landscapes, with covered terraces that blend into rock outcrops and groves of trees, and rooftops covered in planters and natural stone. This thoughtful approach is continued throughout Eleven B, whether in a living room with open-sided walls and built-in sectionals or in the dining area, which features relaxed wicker chairs. The fully equipped kitchen conceals everything you’ll need behind glossy flat-fronted cabinets that make a minimalist statement.Each of the three bedrooms at Eleven B is its own luxury haven, with a king bed and en-suite bathroom. Linger in the bedrooms’ lounge areas or step out onto your own terrace for some private stargazing. Touches like wood benches and colorful artwork add warmth to the sleek spaces.Guests of Samujana enjoy exclusive access to the estate’s private beach, as well as complimentary shuttle service from the Plai Laem area to the family-friendly Choeng Mon Beach or the livelier scene at Chaweng Beach. Stay on the property and have staff arrange an in-villa massage, class or personal training session. Or discover the area’s vibrant shopping and dining, book a yacht and see how many secret coves you can find on a honeymoon-worthy expedition, try out scuba diving or ziplining, or tee off at one of two nearby golf courses. If you’ve come to Thailand to celebrate a special occasion, Samujana has a beautiful lawn and event space for tropical weddings, family reunions, birthday and anniversary parties or yoga retreats.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Overlooking the inviting deep blue waters of the Andaman Sea, this serene villa is the epitome of peace and tranquility. Here on pristine Natai Beach you can enjoy an unforgettably idyllic Phang Nga vacation. From your deck you can marvel at uninterrupted views of the magnificent ocean. From under the protection of your sheltered pavilion you can dine al fresco as dusk falls and paints the sky crimson and indigo. With exclusive access to the beach, this villa is a rare gem on a sparkling coastline.Jia at Javana Villas offers unrivalled space and luxury on the very edge of the mighty Indian Ocean. From the moment you arrive and are greeted by the villa’s cascading waterfall you’ll fall under its spell. Your inviting pool is separated from the sea by an uncluttered strip of lush grass and sentinel palm trees. Echoing the gentle sloping bed of the sea, it’s a cool, split-level refuge on sunny summer days. Two adjacent Sala pavilions feature a majestic 12-seater dining table and shaded beachside space for massages and yoga.This stylish Thai villa occupies three stunning pavilions. At their heart lies ‘The Great Room’ which delivers open plan living on a magnificent scale. Glass doors slide into the walls to reveal comfy chairs and sofas arranged to give you superb sea views or peaceful privacy. An elegant dining table waits to play host to delicious local meals prepared by your Thai chef. Inviting family rooms sit either side of this impressive centerpiece and include an entertainment space boasting a projector screen and snooker table.The villa’s six sumptuous bedrooms are divided equally between two peaceful pavilions. Fully air-conditioned and dressed in crisp, clean linen they flow with effortless grace. All six open out on to an idyllic garden and terrace teeming with plants. Throw open the doors and you can catch the first rays of morning sun. Two rooms also boast alfresco black granite bathtubs where you can bathe accompanied by the glorious sea breeze and soothing sun.Set apart from the bustling beaches of Phuket this is a secluded slice of paradise. Here in exclusive Phang Nga you can enjoy the luxury of your own stretch of sandy, untouched beach. Your property covers almost 90 meters of shoreline and often the only footprints on it will be yours. Once you’ve explored your beachside estate you can head for the awesome limestone cliffs and karsts of Phang Nga Bay. Take a boat trip for a close up view of these vertical wonders including the rugged James Bond Island.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Hidden away on the tranquil hillside of “Millionaire’s Mile,” this paradise retreat is situated in the exclusive Laemson Estate. Around the corner you’ll find peaceful, quiet Kamala Bay. In classic Thai style, the villa features four standalone pavilions. Walk less than a kilometer to your own private, golden-sanded beach where you can snorkel alongside marine life or try your hand at fishing. Traditional thai décor accents the open-concept living space, alongside polished hardwood floors, floor-to-ceiling windows, and pitched roofs. Each bedroom reveals glittering views of the Andaman Sea from sliding doors that bring the outside in. An added bonus? Complimentary housekeeping, 24-hour security and your own private chef ready to give you an exquisite taste of Thailand. Walk across the wide timber terrace and slip into the refreshing turquoise infinity pool. The wraparound store terrace features a comfortable teak daybed where you can catch a glimpse of the vivid sunsets. Inside, plush royal blue couches reflect the tropical setting while towering ceilings showcase natural wood paneling. The landscaped yard is detailed with manicured lawns, lotus ponds and whistling casuarina trees. Surrounded by forest and turquoise waters, this villa is a great spot for a family getaway or vacation with friends. A plethora of restaurants, bars, and clubs in Patong Beach will suit all of your nightlife needs, as well as nearby Kamala village that features an assortment of local street bazaars. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Set within an exclusive gated community of beachside villas in Phang Nga, Amarelo opens onto a secluded sandy beach. Its impressive size and intelligent layout, wide beachside and back lawns make Amarelo an ideal venue for a family vacation, extravagant private wedding or celebration. You’ll certainly be well looked-after: a daily maid service, Thai chef and full-time security are just some of the benefits of staying here.Superior minimalist design and contemporary designer furnishings make this villa easy on the eye and effortless to live in. A huge central lounge is flanked by a spacious family room to the left and a fully fitted, brand name western kitchen and bright, glass-walled sea view dining space to the right. A hi-tech lighting and entertainment system allows you to set the mood in each room and stream your own music from a central iPod docking station. The family room is graced by a wall mounted, flat screen television with satellite channels and a DVD player and even has its own pool table.Acres of glass draw your eye towards the horizon and all the ground floor rooms slide open onto the villa's iridescent 25m saltwater infinity pool and sundeck. Plush sun loungers are poised poolside for days soaking up the tropical sun and the palm-fringed beachside garden also features a spacious covered, al fresco dining area with circular dining table and built-in barbecue. Another furnished beachside relaxation pavilion offers the perfect spot for sunset repose and the wide, lawned gardens at the front and back of the villa create an exceptionally expansive private home.Three of the six bedrooms can be found on the upper level, while three border the poolside. Two are sea-facing master suites with dramatic views directly from their king-size beds. The guest bedrooms are fitted with twin beds, making them ideal for older children or friends who don’t mind sharing. Two of the poolside bedrooms also share a large bathroom with rainshower and indulgent built-in tub and all the beds have firm, top quality mattresses for restful sleep.Peace and tranquility are the order of the day at Amarelo and you can do as much or as little as you like. Work out in the on-site fitness room, laze on the beach or ask the staff to arrange a spa treatment or excursion for you. Phuket International Airport is a 30 km drive.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Reconnect with your family on a dreamy getaway at Samujana Twenty-Six. One of the contemporary homes on the exclusive Samujana estate, this luxury Koh Samui vacation rental has five bedrooms, two kitchens and a layout designed for entertaining. Spend your holiday lounging by the pool, enjoying sunset views from the villa or exploring this magical island together.Built into the hillside above Plai Laem, the villa opens to an expansive terrace and infinity pool that stretch toward the ocean and surrounding smaller islands. After a swim, stretch out on one of the loungers or daybeds, start a game in the garden or retreat to the shade of the home theater or private gym. Southwest exposure puts you in the perfect spot to watch the sunset, and a rooftop terrace is great for stargazing.Open-plan, open-air living areas showcase the views and invite the ocean breeze into every corner of the home. The sunken living room, dining table for ten and one of the fully equipped kitchens feel like part of the terrace, and the barbecue gives you the option for a true al-fresco meal. Throughout the living areas, sleek furnishings are paired with weathered wood tables and stone accent walls for a fresh-looking mix of the modern and rustic.All five bedrooms at Samujana Twenty-Six boast king beds, en-suite bathrooms, lounge areas and private terraces looking out toward the ocean, meaning that everyone gets to sleep in the bedroom with the best view. Full-width sliding glass doors, built-in headboards and accent pieces like mod Swan chairs give the bedrooms a bright yet understated look.Whether it’s your first time on Koh Samui or you’ve been visiting since your honeymoon, a stay at Samujana will make you fall in love with the island all over again. The estate is just 5 minutes from both quiet, family-friendly Choeng Mon Beach and the bustling oceanfront restaurants and bars of trendy Chaweng Beach. Ask Samujana staff to help you arrange a tee time at one of two nearby golf courses, a scuba or snorkeling expedition or even a yacht charter to take you around the coast.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Perched majestically atop the private Samsara peninsula, Villa Benyasiri commands panoramic crow’s nest views over Patong Harbor and the glorious Andaman Sea. Villa Benyasiri is a luxurious modern villa featuring expansive living and entertainment areas. The villa’s upper living and dining rooms open directly onto dramatic wraparound outdoor decks.Relaxed outdoor dining, barbecue, and sunning areas complement a stunning 14 meter infinity-edge pool which appears to stretch far into the horizon. The pool incorporates a shallow area for children and glass panels along its bottom which look into the room below. A small path from the pool deck leads to a large open-air detached traditional Thai Sala, perfect for soaking in Phuket’s classic sunsets. Inside the villa, furnishings are comfortable and tasteful throughout – ideal for families and casual entertaining. Located on the first floor is a home theatre equipped with a 96” projection screen, DVD, and games console.The ambience inside the villa is light, airy and traditionally Thai. From the many artifacts throughout, through to the wonderful use of wood and splashes of color, you’ll feel relaxed and at home on your vacation. You will have a live-in Thai cook included in your stay, so you don’t need to venture into the kitchen if you don’t want to. The living area offers a serene outlook over the sea to the colorful mountains beyond.A handful of en-suite, air conditioned bedrooms offer an array of comfortable spaces for a deep relaxing slumber at the end of every day. The sofa in the media room can be converted into a full size bed if you need the extra accommodation. Benyasiri Samsara caters for a maximum of 12 guests and no more than eight children are permitted. Two of the bedrooms have an extra touch of splendor with access to private terraces for those late romantic nightcaps under the stars.If you can bear to tear yourself away from this incredibly enchanting home for a day trip then there’s a whole world of excitement right on your doorstep in Phuket. For a more relaxing time, you can take a leisurely meander down to one of the nearby beaches (around 10-20 minutes’ walk) and read a book in a shaded spot or splash around in the wonderful warm ocean for a while. Whatever you get up to, you’ll love returning to Benyasiri at the end of your day.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All Rights Reserved.

Benyasiri is one of a select handful of private residences located within the Samsara Estate. Few, if any, private enclaves in the world match the unsurpassed luxury and privacy of Samsara. Straddling a secluded peninsula, it is a stunning juxtaposition of rocky shoreline, tropical gardens, and calming blue waters. Perched dramatically between 40 to 60 meters above sea level, these oceanfront villas offer spectacular panoramic views to the west and north over the Andaman Sea and Nakalay beach and to the south across Patong Bay.

listing.listing_description: Please note: This home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.Villa Andaman is located in the lush Kathu district of Phuket and offers a private vacation experience alongside the high end amenities of a pristine boutique resort. Overlooking the sparkling oceanfront and sandy beach, you will also be close to watersports options, fine dining and golf. As your five senses align in perfect harmony at this stunning Thai vacation rental, a sixth sense will be born in a magical feeling of sumptuous Zen bliss.Enjoy a splash in the private 20m infinity swimming pool with a stunning view of the bay. A large alfresco dining pergola with seating for twelve sits at one end of the pool, a garden lounge on the other. The length of the deck is lined with comfortable sun loungers and parasols. Inside, you will find satellite television, Wi-Fi and a sound system. Or how about racking up a few games in the chic billiards room? Your reservation includes housekeeping and chef services as well as complimentary access to the resort’s restaurant and bar, beach services, spa, fitness center, and children’s club.The open interior features a large living and dining area with a high ceiling, overhead fans and rich textures of wood above, below and throughout the furnishings. The circular dining table includes a lazy Susan, and the living area offers cozy seating around a large coffee table. Ornate Asian showpieces elegantly complement the feng shui of the residence.Six exquisite bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms accommodate up to twelve adults plus two children at this non-smoking luxury villa. Guests will have their choice of four king size beds, one queen bed and two doubles. All of the suites have televisions and ceiling fans, and there are dual vanities and jetted tubs in two of the bathrooms.During your stay at Villa Andaman, you will be just a few minutes away from the Phuket FantaSea theme park where you can take in amazing shows featuring acrobats and elephants. You will also be within easy reach of the cafes and restaurants of Surin and the nightlife of Patong. The villa is also an eight minute walk away from Kamala Beach. Villa Andaman makes a great bet for a family holiday or a special event like a wedding or anniversary. Book your stay today with Luxury Retreats!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Baan Puri villa in Koh Samui is one of those rare gems you will never forget. The beachfront grounds have been planted with over one hundred indigenous species of tropical plants chosen for their beauty and fragrances. At night, with the aroma of night scented flowers in the air, the grounds are magnificently lit and, together, create a chiaroscuro dreamscape.The enormous one-hundred-foot-long blue-tiled infinity pool has permanent, sunken beds. The pool is also ideal for swimming laps, is chemical-free and uses modern ionizing technology and robotic cleaning. A large, partially covered terrace allows alfresco dining, entertaining or simply enjoying the view. Take advantage of the Sonos music system with Bose speakers as the barbecue grill sizzles in the comfort of the Sala. Come in from a sea kayaking excursion to freshly prepared delicacies made by your Thai chef!In front of the entrance water feature stands an impressive two-story pavilion. The ground floor consists of a stunning open plan living area. A stylish kitchen with a dark slate-tiled floor and a center island features all the high quality appliances you would expect. At the other end, a magnificent chilled 400-bottle wine cellar serves as the backdrop to a ceiling mounted one-hundred-inch cinema screen. The lounge area is furnished with stylish, yet comfortable lemon colored sofas, ornaments and antiques such as a large oriental gong. The stately formal wooden dining table makes an ideal spot to share any special announcements.Six finely appointed bedrooms accommodate up to twelve guests at Baan Puri. All bedrooms include ensuite bathrooms and a variety of individual perks. In one of the bathrooms, the various colored orchids hanging by the bath tub help induce truly relaxing tropical hydrotherapy and meditation.Located in Lipa Noi, the beach at Baan Puri villa is one of the finest on the island. With soft white sand, good swimming conditions and outstanding views of the famous Five Islands, Ang Thong Marine Park and the mainland, Baan Puri is also perfectly positioned for enjoying Koh Samui’s legendary sunsets. Tropical resplendence awaits you at this fine boutique holiday destination!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Nestled amongst the luscious green hills of North Chaweng, this six bedroom luxury villa overlooks the Gulf of Thailand. Just minutes from the bustling downtown, Sukham is close enough to come and go easily, yet far enough to maintain relaxing seclusion. And, it’s just a five minute drive from the beautiful sandy shores of Choeng Mon Beach.In a climate like Thailand, you won’t want to spend much time indoors. Luckily, Sukham’s open-concept living/dining room has full wall length openings on two of its perimeter walls. With fresh ocean breeze and natural sunlight filling the interior spaces, its easy to stay connected to nature, even while you’re inside. The kitchen features high-end appliances, retro-modern cabinetry, and a breakfast bar.Sukham has lots of other great features in and around its walls. Upon arrival, you’ll love the stone walkway through the lily pond. Once your settled, relax in the home theatre and entertainment lounge, or, get competitive in the game room or at the billiards table. Outside, there’s lots of scenic spaces to sit, eat, or lounge on the terrace. The infinity swimming pool is the perfect place to spend an afternoon looking out over the Gulf of Thailand. Also included with rental you’ll have a private chef, maid service, and daily breakfast.All six of Sukham’s bedrooms feature king sized beds, en-suite bathrooms, and direct access to the terrace or balcony. The three bedrooms on the upper floor also come with a spectacular view of the Gulf of Thailand.Just a few kilometres away you’ll find the main street of Chaweng. Stop in for some great local cuisine, shopping, and nightlife. The Fisherman’s Village is a great place to visit if you love fresh seafood. And, if there’s a golfer in your group, Bophut Hills and Royal Samui Golf Clubs are just a few minutes from the villa.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
