listing.listing_description: Built within the Samujana Estate, this Koh Samui vacation home is surrounded by tropical gardens and designed to optimize ocean views. With accommodations for eight, this luxury villa is the perfect setting for a beach holiday with the family, or a golf vacation with friends.Decorated with a neutral scheme, this tropical villa is tranquil and relaxing. The earthy tones of local wood and stone compliment the vibrant colors of lush vegetation throughout the property. Easy flow from the terrace to the interior ensures that nature is always enjoyed, and appreciated within. Comfortable designer furniture, positioned thoughtfully throughout the open concept floor plan, is used to separate spaces with out sacrificing ease of flow. As a result, the atmosphere promotes socializing, while maintaining the ability for guest to find privacy when it is desired.Some of the more private areas in Sixteen are the games room, home cinema, and study, all great places to relax and watch a movie, or challenge a friend to a game of billiards. The kitchen comes equipped with a breakfast bar, espresso machine, and a wine fridge. And, if you’re thinking of hosting a dinner party, there’s space for ten at the formal dining area inside, and room for the same out on the terrace. Also on the terrace, you’ll find sun beds, loungers, living spaces, and even a yoga deck, all surrounding the infinity pool. And, included with rental is airport transfer, daily housekeeping, and breakfast.Three of the four bedrooms features king beds, lounge areas, private access to the terrace, and ensuite bathrooms with rain showers, bathtubs, and bidets. The fourth bedroom, great for kids, has all of those features as well, but instead of a king bed, it has two twin beds.Nearby the villa you’ll find Choeng Mon and Chaweng Beaches, the Koh Samui Rain Forest, and shopping, dining, and nightlife on Koh Samui’s Main Street. And, if you feel like a challenge, book a round at Bohput Hills Championship Golf Course.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Villa Malee Sai is a rare blend of colonial elegance and contemporary style, with an expansive open-plan design that really makes the best of its sensational surroundings. Occupying prime position on a private oceanfront estate bordering Natai Beach, this beautiful beachfront villa enjoys panoramic views of one of Thailand’s most pristine bays. It’s an excellent choice for families, groups and wedding parties who want to escape the often-crowded beaches on Phuket.It's easy to switch into vacation mode as you drift between the pool, outdoor pavilions and air-conditioned rooms, constantly connected to the fabulous sea views. The villa comes with two maids and a private chef overseen by an estate manager to deal with individual requests, meaning every need is easily catered for and total comfort is guaranteed. Take tea on the lawn or stroll on the beach. If you crave entertainment, you can choose a blockbuster from the movie collection or listen to your favorite tunes throughout the house.Driftwood sculptures and local art add interest to the subtle décor. A spacious family room sits to the left of the entrance while a fully fitted western kitchen and spacious, glass-walled sea view dining space occupy the lower floor of a pavilion to the right. All the ground floor rooms slide open onto the villa's generous saltwater infinity pool, which is bordered by a teak sundeck with designer loungers positioned poolside for days soaking up the tropical sun. The garden at the rear will take you on a journey of discovery, ending with a game of petanque at the finish. Out front, a furnished beachside relaxation pavilion offers the perfect spot to enjoy the spectacular sunsets as you indulge in a barbecue, fresh from the grill.The villa boasts six spacious bedrooms - three on the upper level and three poolside. Two of the three master bedrooms are ocean facing suites with floor to ceiling windows and terraces offering stunning sea views. The guest rooms also include two twins, ideal for older children while the study bedroom has a large, comfortable king bed.When you’re not swimming, sunbathing or enjoying carefree strolls on the beach, you might want to indulge in a massage or play badminton. Further afield is Phuket Town, an hour’s drive, and the international airport is just 27 km away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: A rising star of a villa overlooking the sunset coast of Koh Samui, Villa Spice at Lime Samui elevates the beach holiday in Thailand with stylish contemporary interiors, personalized service and thoughtful design. From your private hillside perch at this luxury vacation rental, enjoy resort-worthy amenities, five suite-style bedrooms and breathtaking views, whether as a family, with a group of friends or on an ultra-chic honeymoon.Each day at Villa Spice at Lime Samui begins with a daily breakfast. From there, head to the fitness room to fit in a workout, lie down in the massage room or stretch out on one of the lounge chairs lined up by the infinity pool overlooking the Gulf of Thailand. The barbecue is the perfect place to prep dinner before you sit down at the al-fresco dining area; after the meal you can enjoy a favorite in the home theatre. Your stay includes the services of a chef, housekeeper, villa manager and one roundtrip airport transfer.Laid out over a series of terraced levels to maximize the sea views and take advantage of the hillside setting, the villa is open and airy—you’re never far from a window or a glass wall that folds back to let in the warm breeze. When you’re not outside, you’ll want to enjoy the expansive great room, which features a sunken lounge area with cushions the hue of the ocean outside, a dining area with mod white chairs and a fully equipped kitchen with a convenient breakfast bar.Each of the five bedrooms at Villa Spice at Lime Samui has an en-suite bathroom and views of the Gulf of Thailand; four have king beds and the fifth bedroom has has two queen beds and two single beds. Rain showers are a spa-worthy indulgence in each of the bathrooms, and direct access to the terrace from the bedrooms means you can wake up to watch the sun shimmering on the water and feel the warmth on your face.Though the villa feels totally secluded and private, it’s just under 6 km to the shops and restaurants in Nathon and about 5 km to Nathon Beach. You’ll also find both Lipa Noi Beach and Bophut Beach within a 12 km drive, and golfers won’t want to miss Santiburi Samui Golf and Country Club, 7 km away. At the end of your stay, make your connection via Samui Airport, a 19 km drive from the villa.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
